volunteer_experience.info:
JENESYS is an exchange program conducted by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Japan to aid technology development and exchange. JENESYS 2016 was attended by 244 youths from 11 countries.As the ambassador of India, discussed new and upcoming technologies with high ranking officials such as Executive Directors and Mayors in Japan and collectively consolidated information transfer plans which were presented to the Japanese government. This included a visit to the Kawasaki Heavy Industry…
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          JENESYS is an exchange program conducted by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Japan to aid technology development and exchange. JENESYS 2016 was attended by 244 youths from 11 countries.As the ambassador of India, discussed new and upcoming technologies with high ranking officials such as Executive Directors and Mayors in Japan and collectively consolidated information transfer plans which were presented to the Japanese government. This included a visit to the Kawasaki Heavy Industry to study the manufacturing of the Shinkansen bullet train and the Maglev train to conceptualize their implementation in India.
            

    
    

    
        Show less
